channel.title: RStudio on Kevin Rue-Albrecht
channel.description: Recent content in RStudio on Kevin Rue-Albrecht

item.title: How to datapasta
item.description: I was recently told about datapasta, a jewel of a package that provides RStudio addins and functions to freely copy-paste data in and out of a source editor, formatted for immediate use. Resources How to https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/datapasta/vignettes/how-to-datapasta.html GitHub https://github.com/MilesMcBain/datapasta MetaCRAN https://www.r-pkg.org/pkg/datapasta
